ratings.comment: Professor Alonso is the nicest and most accommodating professor I have ever had. If I wasn't graduating I would take her again in a heartbeat. She really cares about her profession and students' input. 10/10.

GWS103 was amazing! All of the information was presented in a way that made it understandable and relevant to real life. Professor Alonso is super sweet and caring. It's important to pay attention and take notes in lecture, but the exams follow the review guide pretty closely, so as long as you're willing to put in the work, it's easy to do well.

Professor Alonso is an amazing lecturer and really made the class feel smaller than it was. Every lecture was intriguing, and discussion sections really help if you have an awesome TA. Always wanted to study because it never really felt like studying! Completely changed my outlook on life.
Ara is absolutely incredible. This class truly changed my life. Male or female, I believe this class should be required for all. TAKE THIS CLASS!!!!
There are no words that can completely explain the goodness in her heart, and the way she cares and helps others, in her teachings and in life.

Awesome class! Really easy for a science requirement. The exams are super fair and as long as you go to lecture and take notes you can get easily get an A. She's super interesting and the class is pretty fun.

Womens Body, Health and Disease. Amazing class, I can't wait to take another class with Ara. Learned so much. Attend Lecture, she makes everything clear. Do your readings cuz they are interesting and she tests on them :)

I had almost no interest in it before and only took it for an easy science, but this is one of the best classes at UW. It honestly did change my life. Every woman - and even men - should take this class. On top of that, it's just the easiest class on campus. But you will not regret taking this class!

THIS CLASS CHANGED MY LIFE. Exams are difficult only because you feel rushed to answer many questions in a short amount of time. You probably don't need to do all the readings but they are all VERY interesting, so DO THEM.

Class is very interesting and you learn a lot. Grading on exams are easy. I never got below a AB on an exam, exams are MC/fill in the blank, T/F, and 2 essay questions. 1 paper throughout the class. Don't need to do all the readings. And there are easy extra credit options that can be done. I'd definitely recommend this class for any reason.

Very caring, very helpful. Her lectures are sometimes hard to understand and she doesn't allow you to use the computer in class. So I would really recommend recording her lectures for notes later. I would recommend her class as long as you record.

Araceli is great, I loved 103, but 533 was a total waste of time. I took it for bio sci credit, and there is no way 533 should count for that. Unlike 103, you don't learn any new, serious knowledge, you just talk about how disadvantaged women are and how we should all be angry advocates. Way too touchy-feely for me, I wanted something more concrete
Amazing professor! She cares so much about her students! Her lectures are interesting and this class is a must-take for everyone--it will help you understand gender and society. You will love her!!
such a great class! i really enjoyed going to lecture, and alonso is phenomenal. this class is perfect for the anti-science student to fulfill a bio requirement.
Love this woman! 103 taught me SO much and lectures/discussions were so though provoking. The class is fair and useful to everyone out there. TAKE THIS CLASS!

She is the perfect combination of adorable and kickass. Such a practical class, I recommend it to all women at UW. Lecture was much more interesting than the readings, which really piled up... don't bother with the Biology of Women book. Exams are very easily graded.
wonderful professor, fascinating class, much of the material is repeated and more indepth from 103, so interesting and truly cares about her work
Awesome professor and lectures are interesting

Love the professor she is so interesting and cute and fun! Her accent is precious. She is passionate about the topic.  Go to lecture and then you don't need to do all the reading.  Lecture is much more interesting.  Stay away from Evegenia as a ta.  She is un-professional and rude at times.

LOVE this class! I learned so much and everything is very interesting. Exams are easy, just need to study the notes because the exam comes straight from them. Araceli is a great lecturer, her powerpoints are easy to follow and very organized. Take this class if you can get in!!
She made what could have been a great class into a a mundane chore. Easy if you pay attention, go to lecture, take notes.

This is my favorite class, the teacher is wonderful and she loves interacting with students. I highly recommend this class to anyone interested in learning more about the female body and alot of things woman go through from child birth to intimate partner violence this class covers it all. No complaints, and you'll love it!!! Not difficult at all.

Ara is a wonderful women with so much to teach! The tests are not hard if you just study the study guides... she gave every word that ended up on the test.  She is also great if you want to get involved in reproductive justice.  STAY AWAY FROM MINJON as a TA

AMAZING CLASS and PROFESSOR! Alonso is the best. Makes lectures and topics interesting and understandable. Very personable, nice, and understanding. She is passionate and caring for her students! The class is A LOT of work and readings and the tests are pretty hard. Stay on top of reading and lectures! Overall, awesome class!!

Pretty easy class, has a lot of readings, three exams, and two three page papers.  Exams are easy if you study and know the main points of all the articles.  Araceli is a good prof and sometimes funny.  its an easy class to take for natural science credits.  I recommend it, but avoid the TA Minjon!!!
She is awesome! Extremely easy class, very interesting, and she is explains everything really well in her lectures. I definitely recommend this class

very easy and clear, and puts everything online so missing a lecture is no big deal. lots of txt assigned but Women's Health is the only one i actually read and got an A in the class. lots of memorization of medical terms but she goes over them so much that its easy. DO NOT GET CHAITANYA FOR HER TA. SHe WILL RUIN THIS CLASS FOR YOU
great teacher,very understanding- I would recommend her to anyone!
nice prof. loves what she teaches. no need to read the books besides the one with the paper. she is clear about what she is putting on exams so you know what to study.

3 credit class and very easy to get an A. Take notes! Exams are based off notes and not off the readings. As long as you pay attention you will do well. Discussion is also interesting. I recommend to anyone who needs an A. The class was based off of 2 exams, 1 midterm paper, and discussion attendance.
Is one of the best professors I've ever had!
Is willing to help students anytime.
She made a difficult class easy and enjoyable.
It was great!

Pretty interesting class... sometimes it was a bit too much of stating the obvious.  That said however go to lecture... If you go and take notes, as well as do the reading (which is pretty easy and interesting) you can do very well on the exams with little studying.  Also there are lots of extra credit opportunities.  Alexis the TA is great!
amazing, do the reading, study a little- easy A, have fun. the ta's are great too!

I had this as an 8:50am class and it was easier to stay awake for than all my other classes.  Araceli is amazing.  I never wanted to miss a class because they were so interesting.  If you read the material and go to lecture, then you hardly even have to study.
No Comments
No Comments
Once you get past the accent, she is a very intersting teacher.  Picks films that actually ADD to the class, which is very appreciated!
